programme.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 - Billionaire Boys Club
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 7 World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, investigates one of the world's most infamous cases: The Billionaire Boys Club. Was the leader of the club, Joe Hunt, so obsessed with money and power that he became a cold-blooded killer?

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - 3:10 To Yuma/Harm's Way
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Detective Pam Childs responds to the disappearance of Maria Miranda reported by Hector, the missing woman's boyfriend and the father of her infant child. Hector explains he received a phone call from Maria in which she complained of being tired.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - The Good Mother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 Missing persons detectives Pam Childs and John Smith catch the case of Nellie Litvinova, who disappeared a few hours after her daughter brought her home from a doctor's appointment. The doctor had given Nellie an injection of pain medication.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - The Good Mother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 Missing persons detectives Pam Childs and John Smith catch the case of Nellie Litvinova, who disappeared a few hours after her daughter brought her home from a doctor's appointment. The doctor had given Nellie an injection of pain medication.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Lost Anniversary/ Checked Out
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 For Detectives Ayanna Corbin and Mike Cochran, this case starts off on the wrong foot. Barbara Naklicki holds off a full two days before reporting the disappearance of her husband, Ed, under the mistaken belief that she needed to wait.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Tangled Web / Street Justice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Detectives Laura Skrip and Joe Struck hunt for a man after his family receives a threat to his life. They must sort through the missing man's troubled family situation and possible drug connections.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Abduction of Alicia Kozakiewicz
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 103 The story of how the Pittsburgh Police and the FBI harnessed cyber forensics to locate missing 13-year-old Alicia Kozakiewicz who had been abducted by 38-year-old Scott Tyree.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Baby Doe
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 104 The tragic story of a child, born into neglect, who was lost in the system, but found, thanks to the huge advancements made in forensic composites, reconstructing an identity through drawing.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The World's End Murders
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 105 This episode explores one of the longest running investigations in modern British history. It tracks the advances in forensic technology that eventually led to the murders being solved after 37 years.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Grifting Grannies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 33 Investigators suspect two grannies are behind a twisted insurance scam, but they have to find the evidence that ties them to a hit-and-run.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Truth Hurts
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 34 A Miami cocktail waitress tells her scandalous truth on a tell-all game show and ends up dead.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Mommie Dearest
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 A woman is bludgeoned to death in her own home, and her severely handicapped teenage daughter goes missing. When investigators eventually catch up with the young woman, they hear a baffling story of a mother's toxic love.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - The Luchalooters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Celebrity little people and twin wrestlers Jorge and Miguel have a larger-than-life appetite for drugs and alcohol. And when they're both found dead after a wild night of partying, an autopsy reveals the culprit is eye drops.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Bad Fortune
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 A high-rolling, high-priced fortune-teller is slaughtered, and detectives must decipher a bizarre set of clues that weave superstition and brutality in equal measure.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - If the Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The mysterious disappearance and presumed death of a surgeon’s wife sparks a feverish homicide investigation, which quickly goes cold.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Bonded in Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 A street preacher and his teenage protégé run an internet scam to rob unsuspecting men, steal their identities, then dump their dead bodies in the woods.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Killer Rabbi
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 When a rabbi’s wife is savagely murdered inside the family’s suburban New Jersey home, it looks like a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Split Personality
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 When a woman is gunned down in the parking lot of her therapist’s office building, it looks like a random act of violence.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - What Happened to Jana
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 The search for an adored local businesswoman who vanished without a trace quickly morphs into a homicide investigation after police discover microscopic evidence inside the woman’s home and car.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Blood Thicker Than Marriage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 Cops investigate the apparent carjacking of a husband and wife in East Los Angeles, California only to discover that the ambush was a ruse, carried out by cousins.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 They were once best buddies in a small Wyoming town. But after Bob Duke's wife and young son die in a tragic fall, it changes this friendship forever, exposing Bob as the killer and Roger as the one to finally expose the horrific truth.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Detectives called the crime scene "a slaughterhouse." Matthew Hoffman killed two women and a boy in an Ohio home before kidnapping a thirteen-year-old girl and holding her hostage. Once arrested, Hoffman's bizarre obsession is revealed.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Damsel in Distress
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 A mysterious caller directs police to a dead body in the suburbs.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Empire of Blood
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 A mutilated corpse prompts a sweeping investigation into a deadly cartel.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Road to Ruin
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 A hard-working family man is shot to death while doing a favor for friend.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Defector
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 158 When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of an impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Hunted
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 159 Investigating a planet applying for membership into the Federation, the crew of the Enterprise finds a group of inhabitants who used to be soldiers but now fight for their very existence.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The High Ground
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 160 While visiting a planet under civil war, Dr. Crusher is taken hostage by an opposing faction of the planet's ruling government.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Deja Q
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 161 Much to Picard's displeasure, Q reappears on the Enterprise, claiming to have been ejected from the Q Continuum, and therefore, lost his powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Matter of Perspective
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 162 The widow of respected scientist Dr. Nel Apgar accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband. Rather than turn Riker over for unfavorable trial, the Enterprise reconstructs the facts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Yesterday's Enterprise
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 163 The Enterprise C enters the Enterprise D's time and space continuum, where they find Picard and crew in a constant state of war with the Klingons, and only Guinan knows it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Offspring
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 164 After returning from a cybernetics conference to the Enterprise, Data creates his own "child," much to the chagrin of his captain, and without regards to the ramifications with Starfleet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 165 A Klingon commander boards the Enterprise in an officer exchange program initiated by Starfleet, much to the chagrin of the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 166 Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens and meanwhile replaced with a replica as impostor captain.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Captain's Holiday
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 167 After mediating a difficult peace agreement, Captain Picard is encouraged to take a much needed rest on a vacationing planet, where he's visited by a strange race from the future, in search of a dangerous weapon.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Tin Man
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 168 The Enterprise reaches out to an alien being while dancing around with the Romulans, who want to attack it in an act of vengeance.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hollow Pursuits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 169 A shy member of the "Enterprise" crew becomes addicted to the holodeck, where relationships are easier there than in real life, when his knowledge is needed in engineering.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Most Toys
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 170 When transporting a dangerous material to the Enterprise, Data is kidnapped and the crew is led to believe he is dead when the shuttlecraft he was piloting explodes enroute.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sarek
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 171 Legendary Federation ambassador Sarek visits the Enterprise to conclude peace talks with a race called the Legarans.

programme.title: Area 51 - Area 51
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's top secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes horrifying, unimaginable secrets.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 107 - Zone Five
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 To combat an epidemic of a narcotic called FUN, OCP recruits a gang of vigilantes to police Old Detroit. However, when Jimmy Murphy enlists, RoboCop uncovers the gang's sinister plot to flood the city with drugs.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 108 - Provision 22
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 When OCP privatizes the welfare system, RoboCop learns that Nancy Murphy is leading a group of jobless people protesting the corporation's methods. Her actions make her a target for a pair of ruthless executives who will stop at nothing to silence her.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 109 - Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Villainous psychopath Pudface Morgan and his gang use OCP's latest cosmetic product, EVE, to unleash a crime wave on the city, baffling the police and RoboCop as they alter their physical appearance at will.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Two
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 A man and a woman, on opposite sides of a future war, encounter each other in a deserted town.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Arrival
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 A plane lands safely, but the pilot, crew and all of its passengers are missing!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Shelter
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Passersby
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 On the road home from the Civil War, a Confederate soldier stops at a burned-out house and gets to know the owner, a recent widow.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Game of Pool
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Mirror
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Grave
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - It's a Good Life
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 Little Anthony Fremont controls an entire town with his ability to read minds and make people do as he wishes.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E11 - Unrealized Reality
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Crichton falls into a wormhole and meets up with a strange man who shows Crichton the consequences of wormhole travel.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E12 - Kansas
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 12 After accidentally returning to Earth, Crichton discovers he is in 1985 and he has altered the timeline.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Deaths-Head Revisited
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 A former Nazi SS Captain returns to the ruins of a concentration camp to reminisce and is met by one of his victims.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Midnight Sun
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 The Earth's orbit has been changed, drawing ever closer to the sun and promising imminent destruction.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Still Valley
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Confederacy scout Sgt. Joseph Paradine finds a town full of Union soldiers, and an old man who claims he used witchcraft to paralyze them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Jungle
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Alan Richards plans to build a dam in Africa on a tribe's ancestral land. The tribe's witch doctor puts a curse on him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Once Upon a Time
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time traveling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Five Characters in Search of an Exit
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Quality of Mercy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.title: FailArmy Presents: Very Merry Fail-mas - FailArmy Presents: Very Merry Fail-mas
programme.desc: Season 1, A very special gift of the most hilarious fails wrapped in the FailArmy Christmas special.

programme.title: FailArmy Presents: Very Merry Fail-mas II - FailArmy Presents: Very Merry Fail-mas II
programme.desc: Season 1, Featuring funny fails wrapped in a Christmas special.

programme.title: FailArmy Christmas - FailArmy Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, FailArmy's best holiday fails wrapped up in a neat little package.

programme.title: World's Most Expensive Fails - The Driverless Boat
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Technology has definitely progressed, but we found out the expensive way that boats can't drive themselves.

programme.title: World's Most Expensive Fails - Sports Car, Meet Fire
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 This one should go without saying, but when cars catch on fire, it costs money.

programme.title: FailArmy Now - Fail Platter
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 What pugs, birds and winter have in common.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alice
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 Tom's latest shuttle acquisition blurs the line between man and machine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Riddles
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 The crew discovers a new side of Tuvok when an enemy attack leaves him stripped of his Vulcan sensibilities.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Dragon's Teeth
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Mysterious corridors in space lead to the discovery of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - One Small Step
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 A subspace anomaly leads to the discovery of a 21st-century space shuttle lost on a mission to Mars.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Voyager Conspiracy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 Seven uncovers a conspiracy to keep Voyager stranded in the Delta Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Pathfinder
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 Barclay uses holograms to formulate a plan to open communications with Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fair Haven
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 11 Janeway's holographic love interest becomes more than just a way to pass the time.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Blink Of An Eye
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 12 Voyager becomes the unwitting focus of a planet's entire civilization.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Virtuoso
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 13 The Doctor's passion for music spills over into his personal life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Memorial
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 14 The crew is haunted by vivid images of a battle they don't remember fighting.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tsunkatse
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 Killing for sport becomes Seven's only means of survival when she is abducted into a ring of fisticuffs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Collective
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 Seven becomes a mentor to five young drones abandoned by the Collective.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Spirit Folk
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 The Voyager crew makes first contact with a holodeck program.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Ashes To Ashes
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 Claiming to be a long-dead crewmember, an alien requests asylum on Voyager.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 7 This episode includes: Forklift Mystery & UD, Unicorn's Secret & UD, Where's Jim?, Ohio Video Robbery and Grace's Ghost.

programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 14 This episode includes: Noble Brothers Run & UD, UD: Motorcyclist's Samaritan, Sweet Sue & UD, Up in Smoke and Tupac Shakur.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 1 This episode includes: Bentwaters UFO (Pts. 1 & 2), Dungeons & Dragons and I.D. Swap & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 9 This episode includes: Kilgore Isn't Here & UD, Myrtles Plantation and Gang Mom.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 13 This episode includes: Missing Angel (Pts. 1 & 2), UD: Smoker Car Baby, Mystery Man, Missing Teacher and Meredith's Mom & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru - MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank - Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 22 A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public television pledge program.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Final Justice
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 8 When tough-as-nails Texas Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo captures a member of the Italian mob, only he can successfully get his prisoner back to Italy to stand trial.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 2: The Undersea City
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 The second installment of the undersea adventure to Atlantis.

programme.title: MST3K: Demon Squad - MST3K: Demon Squad
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Human Duplicators - The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Wild Rebels - Wild Rebels
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 A retired race car driver, talked into going undercover by the police, joins a biker gang and must serve as the getaway car driver.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: King Dinosaur - King Dinosaur
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 In King Dinosaur, the crew pokes fun as scientists are terrorized by snakes, bugs, and dinosaurs on a newly discovered planet.

programme.title: MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze - MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).

programme.title: The Shell Seekers - The Shell Seekers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A reclusive British matron of comfortable means suffers a near-fatal heart attack and decides it's time to get her life in order. Stars Angela Lansbury.

programme.title: Meddling Mom - Meddling Mom
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A woman (Sonia Braga) urges her oldest daughter (Ana Ayora) to have a baby, while trying to play matchmaker for her youngest (Mercedes Renard).

programme.title: Midnight Masquerade - Midnight Masquerade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young woman's life takes a turn when she inherits a billion-dollar company. On Halloween night, she shares a dance with a mysterious "prince" at a costume ball and yearns for the love and romance her life has been missing.

programme.title: Midway to Love - Midway to Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart. Stars Rachel Hendrix, Daniel Stine.

programme.title: Mom's Day Away - Mom's Day Away
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Laura Miller is a happily married mother of two, but as Mother's Day draws near, Laura begins to feel unappreciated in her household. She escapes with her friend for a Mother's Day break in Napa.

programme.title: A Family Reunion - A Family Reunion
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In their youth, the Banner siblings made it big as a rock group, but at the height of their fame, the group fell apart. Now, fifteen years later the siblings reunite in their hometown to take care of their mother.

programme.title: Missing Pieces - Missing Pieces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Notes From the Heart Healer - Notes From the Heart Healer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When recently married Peyton finds herself a caregiver to an abandoned baby, it awakens a desire in her to be a mother. Husband King, however, is not so sure about starting a new family. The third installment The Note.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Aurora
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 The team is kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Hive
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Epiphany
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Pain
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Subversion
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Prisoners
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 When the SG-1 team inadvertently helps a desperate criminal, they are charged as accessories to murder and banished to a penal colony. Only one woman there has the power to help them escape....but freedom might not be worth the price she is asking!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Gamekeeper
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Exploring a strange and beautiful garden in a distant world, the team members are trapped, knocked unconscious, and forced to relive their most haunting memories. Now, before they can find their way back home, they must find the way back to reality.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Need
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 On a mysterious planet, Jackson (Michael Shanks) saves the life of a beautiful princess, but his heroics cause the SG-1 team to be taken prisoner. Jackson and the princess fall in love, but his romance could spell doom for the entire SG-1 team!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Thor's Chariot
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 O'Neill and the SG-1 team travel to the planet of Cimmeria to protect it from a massive Goa'uld attack, but they are quickly outnumbered and overpowered. Can they solve an ancient Cimmerian riddle in time to save the planet…and themselves?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Message In A Bottle
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A seemingly harmless orb from a dead world is brought back to the base through the Stargate, but the strange device infects O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) with an alien organism. Now, the only chance to save him is to let the organism control him!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Family
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 SG-1 goes on a mission to rescue Teal'c's son, Rya'c, from the grasp of Apophis. But, when they finally reach Rya'c, he doesn't want to be saved -- he's been brainwashed and has accepted Apophis as his god! Can Teal'c find a way to win back his son?
